column2:
"聞いてくれて、ありがとう！
みんなの声や応援、しっかり届いたよ！
盛り上がって、輝いてて、最高だった！"

"これだけで、終わらせたくないよね？
そうだよね、みんな！"

"届けよう！次元を隔てた世界にも！
今ここにいない、人にだって！"

"どんなときでも、どんな場所にも光は差し込む！
みんなの心で、世界は輝くよ！
『光の果て』！"

"みんなは絶対に、一人なんかじゃないよ！
世界を隔てていても、心は繋がってる！"

"そして、光の果ては未来に繋がってる！
みんなでつないだ、未来へ！
力を合わせて、一緒に歩いていこうね！"

"If I was alone, would
I have made it this far?"

"At the edge of my sight, a tiny
ray of light constantly beckons"

"Surrounded by darkness, where
tomorrow seemed so distant"

"From the depths of despair,
I hear your voice"
"The days I have always dreamt of"

"Begins to look like
an attainable reality"

"Unlock your hearts, and
let your hopes run free"

"Come now, let’s go together
to where the light resides"

"The dazzling blue skies
stretches endlessly"
"This world is changing,"
"indeed, by our very hands"

"We will share times
of joy and sadness"
"For you are here, together with me"

"Our destination shall be
our new starting line"

"Our imaginations will always lead
us far beyond the distant horizon"
"Even if we are distances apart, I know"
"Connected by our bonds,"
"there is nothing to fear at all"

"Come now, raise your hands,
let’s reach for our dreams"

"Let’s case after the unknown, so
that we shall reach new horizons"
"Look, the future is changing, "
"indeed, by our very hands"

"My heart will guide me along
my never-ending path"
"The miracles have only just begun "

"Within this resounding
melody of blessings,"

"With this light I hold,
I can now"

"sing to my hearts’ content,
free from disruptions"

"Come now, let’s go together
to where the light resides"

"The dazzling blue skies
stretches endlessly"
"This world is changing,"
"indeed, by our very hands"

"We will share times
of joy and sadness"
"Because you are here with me,"
"my heartfelt companion"
"Right here, hand in hand"
"光の果て"
"Quna"
